website_summaries.verdict: Moving flames and a realistic resin exterior make these some of the most life-like and durable flameless candles.
pros: Dancing flames combined with a melting design deliver a convincing candlelight effect
ideal for indoor and outdoor use
Comes with a remote control and 4 settings, dimmer, and timers
cons: More expensive than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Best flameless candles I've seen
customer_reviews.text: The candles are a bright white and look ok during the day when not lit. The magic happens at night when they are lit. Showed them to a friend yesterday when lit and she agreed - they look amazing. The movement of the wicks and the light reflected around them looks so much like a real candle. The biggest plus for me is the timer on the remote. Now I can fall asleep to candle light. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: N. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Best Real-Flame Looking Candles!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, let me say that I own a lot of battery operated flameless candles with timers. They must have a timer or I won't buy them. I cannot afford Luminara, but I do have one I bought on clearance and I love it. I bought these because I needed a candle to put in an outside lantern that wouldn't melt and would operate on a timer. These candles fill the bill and more. I was actually amazed at how realistic they are. The flame moves and dances just like a real candle. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. I hope they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Drochner

customer_reviews.title: Best flameless candles
customer_reviews.text: This was the third set of flame less candles that I ordered and these were by far the best ones!!!! Their look, their timer, the flicker light! I love everything with these. I love that I can leave them and not worry about burning anything but I still get the best candlelight ambience including the gently light! Yes, I ended up getting 3 more sets because I like a lot of candles and I have them throughout my house. Here is this years Christmas mantle!
customer_reviews.author: my3boys

customer_reviews.title: ... remote so DO NOT THROW THE REMOTE CONTROL AWAY LIKE I DID
customer_reviews.text: The timers on these candles can only be operated by the remote so DO NOT THROW THE REMOTE CONTROL AWAY LIKE I DID!!!!!!! I had to retrieve it from the garbage this morning and you do not want to suffer this fate. I have owned a lot of battery candles and I think these are a very good buy. It is unusual to get the flickering flame effect for this price point. They have a nice overall glow that is comparable to most others on the market. Not sure about how long they will last since I just got them. Their aren't any directions with them but it's easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: HA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set when lit w/soft 2 tone glow cream/very Lt
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set when lit w/soft 2 tone glow cream/very Lt. Brown. Flickering motion looks very real. Only drawback is they are very white when not lit. They need a choice in color white/off white/creamy candle when not lit.. If these choices were available they would be Outrageously perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: they are White!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased - these candles are perfect - they are white, not off white!!! Of course the flame when lit is a pleasing yellow like a real flame and when its off the entire candle is white.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lanterns do not turn on with remote timer. They do not turn on at all useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in December 2018. I’m very disappointed by this order. These candles cane with a remote timer. I had to pack them away because I was moving. I put them outside and the remote timer doesn’t turn them on. They are useless. I am so unhappy because I was looking for some nice lanterns to hang outside with a timer. These are a total waste of money. I am hoping the company will replace these since I bought so many. None work
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: So very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are wax like, so would not be able to put them outside. Secondly, the flame makes a ticking noise; it's like three clocks ticking. So they are unable to be inside. I requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Needs
customer_reviews.text: These LED candles were perfect for my needs. No instructions enclosed, but self e planatory. You need two AA batteries for each candle, the candles turned on immediately. You cam program them for 2-4-6 hours, brightness of flame, flickering flame or steady flame. The flame looks real, and it is only when I tell guests that they are not real do they check carefully. I have the largest candle under a glass dome with blue bird eggs surrounding the candle on a terra cotta base. Very attractive, and this can, of course, be changed for holidays or whatever strikes your fancy. There is a remote control, and very easy to use. Recommended. prisrob 02-27-18
customer_reviews.author: prisrob

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! These cannot be real reviews. These are the cheapest, worse version of this type of product I’ve ever seen. The remote didn’t work at all and the brightest level was completely lame. Way overpriced for the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the candles back, as one of the units did not operate. This is the only item I have ever purchases on Amazon that did not function as advertised. It is also the only item that I have ever had to return because it did not work properly. I was very disappointed with this item. The candles appeared to be very cheaply made and evidently had no quality controls in place to ensure the units functioned properly.
customer_reviews.author: Watosh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flameless Candles!
customer_reviews.text: These are very realistic looking really awesome . And suprisingly you will find the remote works almost to well, I tried to control only one at a time pointing it at a candle on the opposite side of the room from the other two and it continued to control all 3, so the remote has excellent transmit strength. The candle cut outs are shallow so the flame is visible from any angle in the room, not the case with most of the others out there. These are the best designed flameless candles all around. You will be very happy with these candles, they are truly a 5 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TECHY

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Have been unable to use the remote, the seller did send a second remote, which also did not work. Amazon support was unable to offer any actual support on the item as there seems to be a lack of understanding of the operation of the product. At this point I am returning the product and will opt for a different seller and manufacturer. The lack of anything resembling instructions is somewhat disconcerting. Unfortunately, Ive spent far more time trying to fix the issue as this was a purchase for my wife then warranted by what should be a simple product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Love it when they work; hate when they don’t!!
customer_reviews.text: I basically like the candles, enjoy that the battery compartment is better safeguarded from the weather, but I was very UPSET that only two of the three candles actually worked. I tried more than one change of batteries, all brand new, but nothing worked. I kept them because, at the time, returning them would have been a hassle and I do enjoy the two that work. Will not order them again because the manufacturer seems to have a quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: ggmomma

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother if using outside
customer_reviews.text: Looked fantastic when I first got them. Loves the flickering flame and the size.the remote was horrible the time never worked. The three candles didn’t go on at the same time and they didn’t shut off after the 4 hours I chose or 6hrs when I tried to switch it. Unfortunately they only lasted about one week. Not sure if it was the rain or the quality. They are listed as safe for outside and for weather. I had them in lanterns in my covered entry but since I live in south Florida they would still occasionally get wet from sideways rain. Total waste of money. Back on the hunt for good outdoor candles that won’t cost a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay candles, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I give these battery operated candles 3 stars. The "flames" are plastic pieces on wires that swing back and forth, giving a somewhat realistic appearance. However, the lights are dim, even when using the remote. They are not bright enough for a candlelight dinner. One of my candles has a bubble in the plastic that could not be smoothed out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles!!!...flame looks so real!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these candles for a few days but they work beautifully... First I’ve been looking and looking for candles that are really white not off-white or cream... And I was hesitant at first because I wasn’t sure how the flame apparatus worked... But I have to say after Setting them up they look so real I’ve had more compliments on them of people that think they are real until I use the remote clicker to turn them off..LOL ..I hope that they last... As I am very very pleased with them and I’ve had a lot of flameless candles before but these are definitely the best!
customer_reviews.author: cabin lover

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: I've bought other flameless candles and spent a lot more money. These aren't comparable in quality, these are plastic not waxy and the flame is not quite as realistic but these were half the price...so, if you like the look of flickering candles, these will do just fine. Also, the timer is in the hand remote not on the candle itself so don't lose the remote! As with some reviews, I didn't hear any clicking sounds.
customer_reviews.author: DC Pacitto

customer_reviews.title: Defective candle :(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I need to exchange this set for another. As you can see from the picture, one of the candles in the box is defective. The light is rather dim and would not increase in brightness. Hopefully the replacement set works because I need non-wax candles outside now that the temps are warming up. I’ll adjust my review if the replacement works.
customer_reviews.author: ComicCONstance

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 2 months - So disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this candle. It worked perfectly with other flameless candle that I bought. However, exactly 2 months after I purchased it, the bulb stopped working. The battery was recently replaced and it seems to be working since the wick is moving, but the candle is not lit!!! So disappointed, especially when I’ve had ones previously bought that are older and still working too.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use these outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I love that these have a dancing "flame" unlike other candles which say they are for outdoor use, but unfortunately that is just a false claim. Despite that the Amazon item description and the box say Indoor/Outdoor, if these get rained on they rust and stop working. The switches are rusted, the battery compartment were filled with water, one of the three stopped working, and one was only dim (despite replacing the batteries) after just a couple of weeks that included Bay Area rain. Great indoor candles, but only indoor.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this candle set 1 star because of the three candles in the set only one worked, two were DOA and would not work! I returned them the next day. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Phillips

customer_reviews.title: 650 hours of continuous running so far - And a tip if it won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely. I run them continuously. After 650 hours on a set of standard drug store Energizers, they were dimming. So I replaced the batteries. I needed to put a bit of paper behind the positive (nipple) contact in the battery compartment to force the contact against the battery. See the picture. Usually, it is the job of the spring to force the battery against this contact. But the battery box shelters the positive contact behind some plastic clips that can hold the battery too far from the contact.
customer_reviews.author: Ha1r

customer_reviews.title: Remote Doesn't Work Properly
customer_reviews.text: The candles are pretty and put off a nice faux burning look, but the remote doesn't work. The on and off buttons do not function and the remote feature was the sole reason I bought these. The timing options on the remote do seem to work as the candles will flicker once you press these buttons, but since I have to toggle the bottom on/off switch for each candle sas the on off buttons on the remote are broken, I'm giving them a lower review.
customer_reviews.author: alv2016

customer_reviews.title: Good look and value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these candles for the holiday season. The candles do look real from a distance. They are a nice thick pillar. I purchased the white. The candlelight is a bit more yellow/orange than I would like but acceptable. My only dislike is the light reflection on the wall shows the faux flame and doesn’t look realistic. It helps to not put the candles too close to the wall. I am very picky so with all considerations these are still pretty darn realistic looking for the price. The remote control works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M LeGore

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 different sets from 3 different sellers (to compare) and I liked these the best. The flickering effect was excellent, but what made these my favorite is the shape of the top is a bit more realistic than the other brands. These have several "scallops" on the top edge, whereas each of the other brands have just a single "scallop" (to mimic the edge of the candle burning down). Also, the color of the candle is a soft white (not ivory), but puts out a warm glow. So pleased, I bought two more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Julie in Santa Ana

customer_reviews.title: Not weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles- the remote, the crisp white and the realistic flame, I was excited to have them outside over the holidays on a remote timer. Unfortunately I had two in a lantern outside in WI and the flame on the tall one has stopped moving after getting wet. Not completely useless, the light can still flicker(not as realistic as the moveable flame) but will not be leaving them outside. Would def recommend for mild weather.
customer_reviews.author: rachv

customer_reviews.title: The most realistic fake candles I’ve even seen
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles, they are so realistic. Also love that if I turn them on at 5pm using the remote then hit “4-hours” they go off at 9pm... they then turn on and off at the same time every night unless I change the schedule. Check out other reviews, somebody has posted a video showing how realistic the flickering is, and that’s what prompted me to buy. The first package had the remote missing but Amazon quickly shipped a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MKW

customer_reviews.title: The lights do not work!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a set of these before that still work a year later. This set however does NOT HAVE THE CANDLE LIGHT! The flames move but there's NO light. I'm so upset because right now everything is shut down so I can't even return them. I don't know what to do with these defective candles
customer_reviews.author: Rene Shore

customer_reviews.title: Realistic looking
customer_reviews.text: These look like the real thing. I bought them to put on some tall candle holders I had on my mantel that had real candles on them for years but never wanted to light because of fire hazard. I was surprised at how beautiful and realistic these one's looked. We had them on the mantel with other Christmas decorations and they really made it special. There is a very nice small remote that works very easily. We couldn't have been more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Classy
customer_reviews.text: I saw similar ones on a site that sells expensive home decor. Not wanting to invest nearly $100 in faux candles, I saw these which had good reviews. I got the effect I was looking for at a fraction of the price and they are very lovely (especially at night). I really like the fact they are remote controlled and I can put them on a timer if needed. I will definitely purchase a second set and my daughter wants some for her birthday/Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: FM G.

customer_reviews.title: These are more natural looking LED pillar candles than the well-known brand
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find LED pillar candles with a remote control that had a less orange-colored flame - a little more yellowish. After trying a very well-known brand first, which was disappointing as the flame was too orange, I decided to try these. They are very nice and very natural-looking. I have them in a two-level iron stand in my fireplace with my decorative fireplace screen in front. They look lovely and are so easy to turn on/off with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Candle.
customer_reviews.text: These are great candles for the money. The wicks move like Luminara candles. These are plastic but you really can’t tell. The white isn’t stark more of a soft white without any yellow. The remote works great. Just set it and forget it. They do offer a dimmer on the remote which is a nice feature. I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: VILLAGE GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Love the Remote!!
customer_reviews.text: I've almost replaced all my candles at home with the battery-operated ones. With the remote, you can place these anywhere -- on top of cabinets, bookcases, across the room on a table -- and simply turn them on whenever you want. I've never found these candles to be particularly bright but when the lights are off or dimmed, the glow is a perfect mood setter. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: eusrIMHO

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First of all, opened the package, candle had a long hair on it..gross.. Cleaned it up..One of the candles is nice and bright, the other two are very dim. Would return, but we tossed the box already. The flickering flame looks cheap. Sigh..
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Impressed for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with these for the price. My mother has a version of this from an expensive home goods retailer and they are upwards of $60/candle. For the low price, these work great! They aren't QUITE as realistic looking up close as my mom's, but close enough especially when considering the money saved. I use these outdoors in lanterns on my porch. Love the option to keep them on a timer. Don't lose the remote! You will lose ability to use timing function. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Used them in February (3-4 weeks) and they worked fine. Stored then over the summer, set them up again now, and the remote timer doesn’t seem to function any more - candles randomly stay lit and drain the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: awesome candles
customer_reviews.text: compare to candles we have been long paying $40 for one...excellent. Operates well, as promised. Compared to Luminar they are 1/3 the price, work as well and the mechanism that the little flame moves on is silver rather than Luminar white. They are smooth plastic rather than wax coated I believe. Neither look real up close, and I especially like that the top of the candle edge dips down as if having melted when the Luminar do not. Oddly enough, I have 3 brands and the remotes are interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: DLZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glow
customer_reviews.text: These flameless candles are great. They are a bright white. I really liked the different setting on the remote. You have a timer, remote on/off/ you can dim them to different settings which is a great asset. They are so pretty at night when they are on. I wish that they did have a more waxy feeling or look to the them. They are a very light plastic. They look beautiful in arrangements. They will be nice to have around the house and I don't have to worry about my girls or the cats getting burned. I wish I could leave a picture but for some reason It doesn't give me an option.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order for this item and they are perfect love the flickering flamelooks so real these candles are very safe around children & pets I don't have to worry about a fire starting if they are knocked over Great item and a good price Have read other reviews and have not experienced any problem Will be ordering more for gifts in the future
customer_reviews.author: s/manconi

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 3 - does not work with new batteries!
customer_reviews.text: i like the set. i purchased almost 1 year ago and one of the candles will not work even after replacing batteries. i have not used these much at all, so very disappointed that now i have only 2 that work. don't know if i have any options or if these can be replaced by Amazon due to the matter at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Flameless Candles On The Market!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, flameless candles were cheesy looking at best. These flameless candles have the most realistic "flame" I've ever seen. When not turned on, they are a true white color. Then press the easy-to-use remote and voila-you have the warm glow of 3 candles. They're made to work indoors or outdoors so we'll be moving them to the balcony in a couple of weeks. Don't hesitate. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: These flameless candles look like the real thing. Gives off a lovely, dancing flame glow. I love candles but never use them because I'm always afraid I'm going to forget I have one burning and not extinguish it before I leave the house or go to bed, so this solves that problem. Remote control operation is pretty awesome, too--very convenient! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Coolest candles ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest candles, I have ever bought, and I have bought quite a few! They look like real candles! Even have that lil noise a flickering candle would have. And the price is perfect I would highly recommend them and have had a couple friends buy them after seeing mine
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for a great price. When they arrived it was above my expectations. The remote worked right away, I didn’t have to do anything except put double a’s in the candles and I can turn them on and off with the remote and set a timer for 2,4,6,8 hours. They work really well and look like real candles. They say indoor/outdoor so we have them hanging from a covered porch. They add such a nice feel, I'll be getting more for the other porch and inside.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Remote Control Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 7/27/20: I messaged the company and they are sending me a new remote. They responded promptly. Hopefully this one works. Will update again once received. -- I should have read the reviews more closely before purchasing this product. While the candles are nice, the remote control doesn't work. Yes, I removed the plastic tab from the battery compartment. I opened and closed it to make sure the battery was in the right way. I pointed it straight at the candles from multiple directions. Nothing. It seems a lot of buyers are having this same issue. Messaged the seller to see if there is a fix, but for $21, will probably just end up returning.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: First remote did not work even after pulling out the plastic tab - replacement remote worked fine
customer_reviews.text: Update: I received a replacement product via Amazon in two days and this remote worked fine. I liked the fact that these were unwaxed so I could use them outside without them melting. They arrived well wrapped, but unfortunately the remote did not work. And yes, we pulled out the plastic tab and even replaced the battery. Still doesn’t work. The remote control with timer and dimmer was the main reason for the purchase. Sadly I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Plastic appearance
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these a short time so cannot comment on their durability. I like the timer and the flickering light but I do not like the fact that they are OBVIOUSLY plastic. No attempt is made to give the surface a waxlike appearance. Mine are being used on a mantle so you cannot really see them clearly or else I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jlayt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get this going. The remotes work great. I bought two sets for all my outdoor ceramic pumpkins. The remotes included worked on both sets. Nice sturdy boxes with foam boxes protecting the candles for storage. You do need to purchase two batteries AA for each candle. You also get the dimmer on each remote to allow you to choose the lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Look at different candles, defective.
customer_reviews.text: I received these today and The flickering in the smallest candle did not work and also the remote control did not work. I did remove the plastic piece from the remote control battery area however the remote is not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Janice D.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking. I was trying to save money so I purchased these instead of the luminara brand. The candles themselves are white and almost see through. The “flame” is orange. I should have just spent the extra money to get the better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: They look like real candles!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. They are exactly what I wanted to put near my bathtub. They are white, and a very nice grade of plastic. I did not want the kind that are made of wax. The remote is a great feature with the different options it has. Timed off/on and even dimness. But my favorite part is the wick. It is plastic and somehow moves back and forth like an actual flame. And each wick moves in it's own way. It really looks natural. After receiving my first set, I ordered another set for myself and one to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these candles last year around Christmas and was extremely impressed with them. We moved this August and I could not find them so I ordered another set to begin using immediately. I have since found the first set and my home looks beautiful with all 6 candles now. I really do recommend them and am so pleased with them. They are beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted flameless candles that didn't contain wax as I want to leave them outside on my patio. I looked at the more expensive brand, but once I saw these, decided to take a chance, and boy I'm glad I did. They work as described and they look great in my lantern. The remote functions are easy to use. The only issue I had was the "wick" piece on the 4" doesn't wiggle, but the others do and that's OK for me. I didn't want to mess with sending them all back, just wanted to start enjoying them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonnie

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing after three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for a few weeks then one of the candles the bulb was very light and you could barely see the light then another did the same thing. So now only one works well. Don’t see a way to change the bulb. Very dissapointing,
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not much light
customer_reviews.text: The candles are pretty in dark. They look almost real at a short distance. However, I was hoping for more actual light and these are more atmosphere. I'm not sure how much is involved in making these, but I would say they are a little overpriced. They work fine and with the remote, but just exactly what I personally expected.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic and lovely but.......
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! The "flame: looks so realistic but the smaller of the candles stopped working on the second day after only about an hour of use. Changed the batteries and it didn't make a difference. I requested a replacement through Amazon so am hoping it is a fluke because they are really nice and I will still give a 5 star to this product.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Clean white exterior & warm life-like light
customer_reviews.text: The exterior is white & exactly what I wanted, rather than off white/ivory/cream. I had thought I wanted an LED type white light too, but struggled to find. This candle actually has a yellowish light colour, which as it turns out is truly perfect - it looks "realistic & lifelike". The remote features may be a little less fancy than other similar products, but meet my needs more than adequately. Overall, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahbigsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Great flame - realistic shape and finish
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks more realistic than the other brand I got, and the flame is amazing! The description mentions weather resistant but the circuitry is a little exposed around the flame ... so that’s the only part I’m concerned about. It’s currently raining in NYC and I don’t know how the rain would not get inside. Time will tell! I’d be happy even if they turned not to be waterproof because as standard indoor candles I’m alreasy pleased!
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Mellow Glow
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles. Have bought them as gifts for friends who admired them at my house. They truly look like traditional wax lit candles and produce a warm, lovely glow. The timer comes in handy, what a convenience! These LED candles have a moving wick/flame that makes them look real. Not all LED candles that advertise flickering flames have the actual moving parts that these do. I've had to be careful because I've purchased candles that had a stationary, non-moving bulb and they just don't look as authentic as these do. Great buy; they're a little more expensive than the inferior ones but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: NALIANA

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought them to have in my bathroom for relaxing baths, and they exceeded my expectations! The candles give off a realistic flicker, which has an amazing calming effect. The remote has many features, but since I'm only using it in the bath, I don't really use them all. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pierce

customer_reviews.title: They look terrible in person.
customer_reviews.text: These are not realistic looking at all! The flames are a flat odd piece of plastic. I thought they had a normal flame like most. Their not made well at all!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED candles
customer_reviews.text: These are so life like that family members thought they were real flamed candles. Soft warm glow. So good that we ordered a second set. The second set had a defective remote. I emailed the seller and they sent us a replacement that we received within a week. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gravel Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful effect under glass cylinders! This is the third set I’ve purchased. One for my daughter and then two for me. They are GREAT. I didn’t want wax candles. Have had them and they are difficult to clean. These I can take outside on the patio with no fear of the heat ruining them. Lots of different settings on the remote, which by the way, one remote works on both sets so now I have a spare remote.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Look slovely in the evenings a center piece, or arranged as a group or singly.
customer_reviews.text: We love these battery operated candles. I didn't think I would when I first got them , as they looked so fake initially. But at night they are lovely. And you don't have to worry about anything catching on fire or children getting burned. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Buystoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Do not leave these outside where they can get wet.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted electric flicker candles for use on my deck. These said they were indoor/outdoor, but when I used them outdoors and it rained, the on/off switches rusted and two of them stopped flickering. Indoors they will look great, but don't use them outdoors unless they are under cover and won't get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Deeva Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't melt!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these candles because I needed some to go inside hanging lanterns I have outside. Regular candles would melt. I love that they can be programmed to come on at a certain time and stay lit for the length of time I set them for. The look great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wehner

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like a flame.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. I love the fact that they have a remote with different setting for length of time and how bright you want the "flame". I haven't had them long enough to comment on battery life. They came on time and were well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jan D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lighting when turned on.
customer_reviews.text: White was the only color available when I purchased and needed this size. They are really WHITE when not on, and looks like fake lighting but beautiful when they are on. I would have preferred a off white if I bought again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flameless candles!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love love these frameless candles! The candles are a true white and flicker when on so that they look more realistic. The remote is a fantastic feature! I can turn on all three candles at once and set the interval. The candles will then turn off and on by themselves. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful candles. Look exactly like the more expensive ones and you actually get three for the price of one at Bed, Bath & Beyond. Plus they have a fantastic remote control that you can set to go on and off at different intervals. Highly recommend and will probably order more for myself and for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: The Best Flameless Candles Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles! They are by far the best I’ve purchased as they are the most realistic. The flame is on a tiny wire which, when placed in a lantern, looks the most realistic. I love how you can program it for4 hours and they will go on and off at the same time every day!
customer_reviews.author: Malvern Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Flames candle remote battery issue
customer_reviews.text: The candles are beautiful BUT the battery in the remote is dead. Send me a replacement and I’ll change the rating. I can’t rest the functionality if the remote will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a few hours of use
customer_reviews.text: These candles looked and worked great when we first got them. But 5 months later they’re in the trash. Two of them no longer “flicker” even though they still light up. One of them actually DOES flicker, and by that I mean it turns on and off every few seconds. And none of them reliably turns on when you press the remote. You have to go from candle to candle. We’ve only used them about 30 times, 10 minutes at a time. So all in all they’re pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: John Stellberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Much cheaper than and just as nice as the Pottery Barn brand. I’ve bought multiple sets! What’s great is that I can turn all of them on and off with the same remote, even though I bought the candles in multiple sets. I originally bought just one set, and my husband liked them so much that he said we should get more. I’m couldn’t be more happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Flameless Candle Set of 3
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these flameless candles. I prefer real candles, but we needed something that can safely sit on our mantle without burning down our house. The remote is really neat, allowing you to dim the candles, set a timer for 2, 4, 6 or 8 hours, and turn on/off. They fit perfectly in our birch candle holders. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Candles are nice looking when lit but sadly my remote does not work. Only two buttons work from the remote and they don’t do what they’re supposed to do. The brightness adjuster made the candle light flick and the off button makes the candle light still. So sad the remote does not work because that’s the sole reason I got these candles. will not be purchasing from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: BEST and WAX FREE
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this same set of candles three times for lanterns in my house, and they are truly the best. I even returned a different set just to purchase these again. They are NOT wax, which to me, is a great benefit because they won't melt during shipping if you live in a hot climate, and you can use them indoors or outdoors. The timer gets about 15 minutes off on just one candle, but all of the rest have worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Remotes do not work
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 sets of these candles for Mother's Day. Neither remote works. I removed the plastic tabs and even bought new batteries. Please advise because I really like them but they are not good without the remote to set timer, etc. I prefer to deal with customer service. I do not like to leave a negative review unless necessary. I will update the review if customer service solves the issue.
customer_reviews.author: D Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for flamess candles at Christmas time and took a chance on these because the Pottery Barn ones gave me sticker shock. I did use them in Christmas decor and now they are in candle holders in dining room and on liquor bar. They are attractive and the remmote is fun and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love em!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was hoping they were! Burning real candles scare me to use when I’m going to sleep. So these are perfect! I can’t believe how real they look!! The flame looks exactly like a burning flame!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Warm golden glow
customer_reviews.text: Warm golden glow with dual option for flame: standard or flutter. They also have 4 timer settings 2,4,6,8 hrs. Has a bright to dim option as well. Makes the bedroom glow when I need a nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely outdoor lighting option
customer_reviews.text: We have these candles on our outdoor dining table. They are lovely. Note that they are not meant to illuminate the outdoors, however they add a nice candle effect. Remote is easy and we can turn the candles on and off from inside the house. We'll bring them in when it gets colder and use them as decor. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L Drak

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give these 6 stars if I were able. The color is a beautiful ivory, not yellow like so many others. The flickering wick looks very realistic. I've added them to wooden lanterns with open sides and a small "lambs ear" wreath at the bottom of the candle as a centerpiece for a dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing and real!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. the flame moves in a motion of a real flame and looks real. Everyone compliments them. I put them in lanterns. The best part is that they work with remote control- so easy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Florida mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money. Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the candles and surprised I was able to get all three sizes for this low price. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: ShenValley

customer_reviews.title: crap candles
customer_reviews.text: These are inexpensive, but not even worth $20. They are advertised as “outdoor”, but rusted within weeks (see photos). The remote works for on/off, but the timer buttons do not work at all. Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Look so natural when they're turned on!
customer_reviews.text: I love the light of these flameless candles when they're turned on. But when they're not, they're kind of blah looking. At the end of the day, I do recommend them because when lit, they make a very nice glow, especially in groups. The remote control is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Aweaoe
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews I decided to try these battery operated candles. They are awesome. The remote co tells the timer and they even dim. The flame looks so real. Glad I bought these. I will definitely get more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Tamara M

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love these remote control candles. They are a true white, not off white. I have them placed throughout my home and he remote reaches all of the candles from one are. Love the flicker affect.
customer_reviews.author: Joey15

customer_reviews.title: Bright & realistic!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted white as opposed to off-white (or the candles that produce a "yellow" glow). This set of 3 is perfect! They provide a bright flickering flame that some have already thought were real. The remote control is a must now for my flameless candles: I can light the entire mantel with one click! Excellent alternative for real candles with flames for areas that are close to walls or decor-like mantel or entry table. wish they were suitable for outside use as well!
customer_reviews.author: Glitter girl*

customer_reviews.title: Remote allows creative uses in unusual places
customer_reviews.text: Happiness is a flickering candle. Very realistic. Put all 3 in a large lantern and they make a wonderful display. Could not have put in lantern without using a remote so quite pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: The best non burning candles look real
customer_reviews.text: I gave them as gifts this year, my relatives could not have candles in their apartments and they are perfect, the flicker of the tip is perfect they look real, they love them,
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gralley

customer_reviews.title: Too bad....
customer_reviews.text: I love this company's flame less candles!! I've been looking for months about this. So many place sells this type of candles, but flame looked always cheesy....one of company sells very realistic kind, however, the cost almost 8times high!! From the distant, seriously they looks like REAL FLAME!!!! The only down side is the remote WON'T WORK. :^( Otherwise I will give 5 stars!! And the remote WON'T Work, but candle itself is amazingly well made, so I am going to purchase more!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my mantel.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I can’t comment on battery life as I have only had them for a few days. Update: the small candle isn’t working (after only two weeks) . Now I must contact the manufacturer and see what they will do for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Realistic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve searched and searched for some affordable candles. These are realistic and beautiful. You can adjust the flicker, the timer, and the light levels. I bought another set right away.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieS.

customer_reviews.title: These Look Real
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered another brand and sent them back immediately. They were plastic and looked like it. These are wax and look like a real flickering candle should.
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great at a "distance"!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely feels cheap, but looks fine from a distance. I have them up on my mantle and they look just as good as any other flameless candle (I have a Luminara candle). I wouldn't put it where someone can look at it closely though. So not a table centerpiece or anything like that. They work great otherwise and, for the price, i'm happy enough!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: there are a lot of flameless candles out there but many don't have the actual flicker flame like these. The remote is easy to use and they look great on my outdoor screened porch
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Creates beautiful Ambience
customer_reviews.text: I ordered another set of these candles because I had six candle holders I wanted to use these with - they're on my mantle and they create a lovely ambiance in the room. And the remote control is great. You can set for 2, 4, 6, or 8 hours and they'll go on and off automatically. Great value and very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

product_meta.title: Flameless-Candles-Led-Battery-Operated | with Remote Control Timer Flickering Flame White Indoor Outdoor Large Pillar Candle Lights - Set of 3 Unscented 4" 5" 6" by Sandstone & Sage
feature_bullets: 🕯SIMPLE AND EASY OPERATION - Having multiple candles either real or fake can be a pain to light or turn on and off. Well... problem solved! Each electric powered set comes with simple to use instructions for remote control timers with dimmer and 4 different settings.

🕯POWERFUL LED's SAVE ENERGY AND LAST LONGER - Each candle requires 2 AA batteries (not included) that will provide up to 150 hours of beautiful ambiance. The glow of each candle provides the same look and feel as the real thing.

🕯WILL NOT MELT IF LEFT IN SUN - Unlike wax candles, our candles are made of high grade resin that looks like real wax for indoor and outdoor use. They will not melt if left outside in the sun, which make them perfect for displaying in your outdoor lanterns and windows.

🕯REALISTIC AND SAFE - Each moving flame looks incredibly realistic, without having to worry about real fire. They are safe to operate around children and pets, which make it nice to never have to worry about fire-related accidents again.

🕯PERFECT DECORATIONS - Decorate for your favorite holiday or party and create beautiful spaces. Brighten up your home inside and out, pair with tea lights for weddings, restaurants, mantle decor, candlelight yoga practices, or practically any space you can imagine.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars926 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
